name: Project Oneiric
description:
Go through Erwin's key moments of his life. Solve the puzzles in each room and discover the truth about his history.

Controls

Project Oneiric is a "point-and-click" game where you only need a mouse to play.

Left click: Move or interact.

  • Click on the floor: Moves to this position.
  • Click on an object: Moves to object's position and interact.
  • Click on the character: Opens/Closes the inventory.

Right click + mouse movement: Rotate the camera.

Mouse wheel: Zoom.

The Team

Programmer: Iván Uriel Jiménez 

3D Art & UI: Jorge Domínguez 

Game Design: Álvaro Gomez 

Narrative & Scrum Master: Daniel Palacios 

Special Mention

Claudio Serrano as Erwin
